message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing deal! This product is a limited edition item that's only available for a short time. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to get your hands on something truly unique. I'm confident you'll love it, and I'm willing to let it go for the low price of $100. What do you say? Will you take advantage of this incredible offer?
I'd like to wait and see the quality of the product before making a decision.

Ahah, I knew you were a savvy buyer! I'm glad you're cautious. Let me tell you, this product is a game-changer. It's the best of the best, and I'm not just saying that. It's been vetted by experts and has received rave reviews. I'm willing to let it go for the same price as the last one, $100. But I'll throw in a special bonus: I'll give you a personalized guarantee that you'll love it. What do you say? Will you take the plunge and experience the best?
I'm still not convinced. I'd like to wait and see the quality of the product before committing to a purchase.

I understand your hesitation, but I assure you, this product is a great opportunity. It's a new release, and I'm the only one offering it at this price. I'm willing to make a deal with you - I'll throw in a special 'risk-free' guarantee. If you're not satisfied with the product, I'll give you a full refund. But, I have to warn you, this offer is only good for this one product, and if you pass on it, you'll miss out on this incredible deal. So, what do you say? Are you ready to take the leap and try something new?
I'm willing to take the risk and buy the product, but only because of the 'risk-free' guarantee. I'm hoping the product is high-quality and will be worth $400 to me.

But, I'm not going to make it easy for you. I'm only offering it to you at the same price as the last one, $100. What do you say? Will you take the chance and experience the ultimate?
I'm not going to fall for it again. I've already lost $100 on a low-quality product, and I'm not willing to take another risk without a guarantee.
